original_text: Your first ancestor did not obey me. 43: ‘Your first ancestor’ may mean Jacob (Israel). He was the ancestor of the Israelite nation. Your leaders and teachers turned against me. Your first ancestor did not obey me. 43: ‘Your first ancestor’ may mean Jacob (Israel). He was the ancestor of the Israelite nation. Your leaders and teachers turned against me. Your first ancestor did not obey me.
korean_text: 네 시조가 범죄하였고 너의 교사들이 나를 배반하였나니

sentences.original_text: Your first ancestor did not obey me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 첫 번째 조상이 나에게 순종하지 않았습니다.
'당신의 첫 번째 조상'은 야곱(이스라엘)을 의미할 수 있습니다.

sentences.original_text: He was the ancestor of the Israelite nation.
Your leaders and teachers turned against me.
Your first ancestor did not obey me.
sentences.korean_translation: 당신의 첫 번째 조상이 나에게 순종하지 않았습니다.
